# matchDesignatedRequirement

**Instance Property**

The designated requirement of the app that matches the rule.

## Declaration

```swift
var matchDesignatedRequirement: String { get }
```

## Accessing app rule properties

- **matchSigningIdentifier**: The signing identifier of the app that matches the rule.
- **matchPath**: The file system path of the app that matches the rule.
- **matchDomains**: The hostname domains that match the rule.
- **matchTools**: An array of app rule objects that restrict the rule so it only matches network traffic generated from helper processes.
